execution_plan.description: Get order counts per customer from the centralized Orders table (orders_db MySQL).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Get order counts per customer from the EU sales orders table (sales_eu PostgreSQL).

execution_plan.description: Get order counts per customer from the US sales orders table (sales_us PostgreSQL).

execution_plan.description: Get country and state (county) for customers that have orders in step 1 (users_db PostgreSQL).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, country, county AS state FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Get country for EU customers that have orders in step 3; state is not available in this DB so return NULL for state (sales_eu PostgreSQL).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, country, NULL::text AS state FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step3.customer_id);
